content: small neko crocheted cat once you know how to make a sphere you can design your own amigurumi japanese-style crocheted animals here is my design a small neko or cat materials worsted weight yarn in mc and cc1 plus tiny bit in cc2 for embroidery 3 75 mm crochet hook tapestry needle stuffing head & body round 1 with mc chain 4 and slip_stitch to join round 2 6 single_crochet in centre of ring 6 sts round 3 single_crochet twice in each st 12 sts round 3 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet next st repeat from * 18 sts round 4 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet next 2 sts repeat from * 24 sts round 5 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet next 3 sts repeat from * 30 sts rnds 6-10 work even 30 sts round 7 * decrease in next st single_crochet next 3 sts repeat from * 24 sts round 8 * decrease in next st single_crochet next 2 sts repeat from * 18 sts rnds 9-10 work even 18 sts stuff head round 11 * single_crochet twice in next st single_crochet next 2 sts repeat from * 24 sts round 12-20 work even 24 sts round 21 * decrease in next st single_crochet next 2 sts repeat from * 18 sts stuff body optional you may run a piece of yarn through the neckline to tighten the neck round 22 * decrease in next st single_crochet next st repeat from * 12 sts round 23 * decrease in next st repeat from * 6 sts fasten_off hide the ends inside the body ears choose three row on the side or top of the head which should span one ear with mc pass the hook under the first row and make a slip_stitch single_crochet 1 pass the hook under the second row and single_crochet half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in the same stitch pass the hook under the third row and make a slip_stitch fasten_off hide the ends inside the head repeat on the other side of the head for the second ear muzzle round 1 with cc1 chain 4 and slip_stitch to join round 2 6 single_crochet in centre of ring 6 sts round 3 single_crochet twice in each st 12 sts fasten_off sew the muzzle to the head with cc2 embroider the nose and eyes hide all ends inside the head tail with mc chain 16 sts turn and single_crochet to end fasten_off and sew tail to the body hide all ends inside the body arms & legs with mc chain 4 and slip_stitch to join work even until limb is desired length fasten_off and sew to the body hiding all ends inside the body repeat for other limbs
